mapper.select: SELECT Re.recipeId, Re.recipeName, Re.memberId, Re.recipeRegDate, Re.recipeTitleImg, Re.recipeHitCount, M.name AS extra__WriterName FROM recipe AS Re LEFT JOIN `member` AS M ON Re.recipeId = M.id WHERE 1 ORDER BY Re.recipeId DESC
SELECT Re.* from recipe AS Re LEFT JOIN `member` AS M ON Re.recipeId = M.id WHERE 1 AND Re.recipeId = #{recipeId} ORDER BY Re.recipeId DESC
